page.title: 13The Industrial Site.
page.content: The small industrial site is located at the Eastern side of Cockfield. Although it is in the country it is an advantageous position as it is 13 miles to Darlington,50 miles to Newcastle,40 to Sunderland and very near to Barnard Castle and Bishop Auckland.It is also close to a good network of roads.The site was founded by English Estates 3 years ago.The site is small having only 3 units. Unit A is taken by a printing firm and Units B and C by a Kitchen Furniture firm.Although no more factories can be built on the site each Unit could be extended.As an initial incentive firms were offered 2 years without payment of rent or rates.Both firms using the site now seem to be well established. The printing firm have some very up to date equipment and like to employ local people.
